name: redtube.com
description: Redtube.com is an Adult 18's Internet service that provides video hosting services. Users can add, view, comment and share these or others.

config.name: Youtube
config.description: Youtube.com is a world famous video hosting, which allows users to watch, upload and share videos with their friends.

options.name: apiKey
options.desc: API app key. Add it from https://console.developers.google.com/project/PROJECT_ID/apiui/credential. Add credentials - API KEY

options.name: apiClientId
options.desc: API app clientId. Add it from https://console.developers.google.com/project/PROJECT_ID/apiui/credential. Add credentials - OAuth 2.0 client IDs. Click on the generetaed id and fill from 'Client ID'

options.name: apiSecret
options.desc: API app secret key. Add it from https://console.developers.google.com/project/PROJECT_ID/apiui/credential. Add credentials - OAuth 2.0 client IDs. Click on the generetaed id and fill from 'Client secret'

options.name: regionCode
options.desc: Content will be relevant to the selected country. The parameter value is an ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

options.name: config
options.desc: Url encoded path to file which control menu items, if not provided, use https:/redtube
